messages.text:
On Tue, Jan 24, 2012 at 20:28,  <adg@golang.org> wrote:
> Is this an unrelated fix?

It happens when you are sitting in a
completely empty repository and trying to
use codereview for the first checkin.
So not completely unrelated.

Russ

LGTM

http://codereview.appspot.com/5564054/diff/4002/lib/codereview/codereview.py
File lib/codereview/codereview.py (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5564054/diff/4002/lib/codereview/codereview.py#newcode3322
lib/codereview/codereview.py:3322: out = RunShell(["hg", "parents", "-q"], silent_ok=True).strip()
Is this an unrelated fix?

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=ea96675c970c ***

codereview: support for subrepositories

R=golang-dev, adg
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5564054

subject: code review 5564054: codereview: support for subrepositories
